description: The Ulysses was an Alliance battleship endowed with the contrasting attributes of being lucky (since it tended to survive battles with little damage) while at the same time drawing enemy attention (often being the first ship to come into contact with an enemy fleet). Served as http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wenli]`s flagship after http://anidb.net/ch202 [Admiral Merkatz] took command of the http://anidb.net/ch82015 [Hyperion]. Pennant number 913-D.
name: Ulysses
